snippet.title: Mr. Donovan Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
The official Steam trailer for Mr. Donovan.

Learn the secrets of your new world in order to repair your space ship and survive!  Mr. Donovan is a top-down, action-adventure game where you must mine for resources and defend your ship to survive and escape the planet.

Steam Page:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/580510/

Webpage:
http://www.mrdonovangame.com/

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/MrDonovanGame

Coming to Steam Early Access early 2017.
